name: Stay At Home Hero!
description:
There is a legend in the kingdom of Clichesvale that when Great Danger threatens the land, a hero from another world will arrive to save them with skill and grace...

Meet Grace, age 45, a stay-at-home mother of two teenagers!

Grab a coffee and a blanket, get comfortable, and please enjoy this original story turned visual novel!

  • 10,000+ words
  • ~ 40 mins of game time
  • Short, goofy choices
  • 3 Beautiful companions ... plus one
  • Single ending
